text: Tell me about yourself and your background in {role}.
followups: Can you elaborate on your most recent experience?
ideal_answer: Provide a concise overview of your professional background, highlighting key skills and experiences relevant to the role.

text: Describe a challenging technical project you worked on as a {role}.
followups: What was the outcome and what did you learn?
ideal_answer: Use the STAR method: describe the Situation, Task, Action you took, and Results achieved.

text: How do you handle tight deadlines and pressure in your work?
followups: Can you give me a specific example?
ideal_answer: Explain your approach to time management, prioritization, and maintaining quality under pressure with a concrete example.

text: What technical skills and tools do you bring to this {role} position?
followups: Which skill would you say is your strongest?
ideal_answer: List your relevant technical skills, focusing on those most applicable to the role, and provide brief examples of how you've used them.

text: Describe a time when you had to learn a new technology or skill quickly.
followups: How did you approach the learning process?
ideal_answer: Describe your learning methodology, resources used, and how you applied the new knowledge in practice.

text: How do you approach debugging and problem-solving in your development work?
followups: Walk me through your typical debugging process.
ideal_answer: Explain your systematic approach to identifying, isolating, and resolving technical issues, including tools and techniques you use.

text: Why are you interested in this {role} position and our company?
followups: What excites you most about this opportunity?
ideal_answer: Connect your career goals and interests with what the company and role offer, showing you've researched the opportunity.

text: Describe your experience working in a team environment.
followups: How do you handle conflicts or disagreements?
ideal_answer: Provide examples of successful team collaboration and how you contribute to team dynamics and resolve conflicts constructively.
